participant_1.background:
I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood.
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
my favorite coffee is french vanilla.
i listen to classical music.
I wash my uniforms every week because I work at an animal clinic.

participant_2.background:
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.
I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
i have several children.
i live a lie.
I would not be able to teach if I were blind because I would not be able to see my students or the blackboard.

content.text: Hey how are you today?
I am doing alright, thank you for asking! What about you?
Not bad! I am just doing some work and listening to music.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I really enjoy classical music.
I like classical music too! I used to be a librarian, but I had to quit because I kept forgetting where I put things.
Oh no! That must have been frustrating.
Yeah, it was a little bit. But I'm glad I got to spend my last birthday at the library with my friend Nanette.
That sounds like a nice way to spend a birthday.
It was! We had a lot of fun reading books and talking.
I'm glad to hear that!
Me too! So, what do you do for work?
I work at an animal clinic.
Oh, that sounds like a cool job.
It is! I get to work with animals all day long.
That must be really rewarding.
It is! I love animals.
Me too! I have a few cats and a dog.
Oh, that's great! I have a cat and a dog too.
That's awesome! We should have a playdate sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I will let you know when I'm free.
